article_title: It's Not Just Healthcare.gov, Obamacare Will Soon Create A Severe Doctor Shortage

article_metadata.description: When demand exceeds supply, doctors have a great deal of flexibility about who they see and when they see them.
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
